comments.body: For facts modules it's standard to return the `ansible_facts` key as in [cloudfront_facts](https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/modules/cloud/amazon/cloudfront_facts.py#L518) and others. Can you make the results available as facts under a key such as `vpc_peering` or `ec2_vpc_peering`?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +142,146 @@    results = [camel_dict_to_snake_dict(peer) for peer in get_vpc_peers(ec2, module)]

    module.exit_json(result=results)
